contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xocəsən |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|City]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Baku]] |subdivision_type2 = Raion |subdivision_name2 =[[Binəqədi raion|Binəqədi]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total =5100 |population_footnotes ={{citation needed|date=October 2010}} |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=40 |latm=24 |lats=44 |latNS=N |longd=49|longm=46 |longs=18 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xocəsən''' (also, '''Gadzhi-Gasan''', '''Khodzhagasan''', '''Khodzhasan''', and '''Khodzhi-Gasan''') is a settlement and municipality in [[Baku]], [[Azerbaijan]]. It has a population of 5,100. == References == {{Reflist}} *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150A313774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Baku}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xocesen}} [[Category:Populated places in Baku]] {{Baku-geo-stub}}
